channel.title: Putting a team together for new private sever
channel.description:
Hello all (sorry if this is in the wrong section, im new) i am going to be starting up a runescape private server in the next following weeks, i am playing on going with a vps company to host it. i will be currently working on a website, features etc. so i am looking to put a team together, this team will consist of......
Coder (java of course) GFX designer (for homepage design, webclient design, specific items etc.) Co-Founder/Partner (to help me run things smoothly) (if you come up with an idea of being something please message me and i will review and either accept of decline it)
if you think i am inexperienced about private servers, well i have ran a couple of servers about 1-2 years ago, 1 was successful but i didn't have the time to run it, or the money (i know have a very high paid job and can run a server easy) i did a bit of scripting for shops, banks and custom teleports (yes it is very basic) anyways if you are interested in any position above feel free to leave a post below, or message me (whatever is easiest for you) i dunno how many spots are for each position, i will work it out in the next day or two (or depends on how many people submit for a position) i havn't decided on a name yet (i have alot of other things to do and think about before i get to that)
also feel free to move this thread (if it's in the wrong section)

item.title: Putting a team together for new private sever
item.dc:creator: @ImSnippy ImSnippy
item.description:
@ImSnippy wrote:

lol i meant java

Read full topic

ImSnippy:

looking for a coder, might get payed for coding

Rule 7: We do not sell anything on this site, period. This includes offering 'rewards' for donations or anything like that.

nope

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Being new here is no reason for putting this shit in the wrong section. You can clearly read that this is general discussion, if you’d browse down maybe 7 boards, you’d find development teams who’d ever have thought of posting something about a team in there, eh?

Read full topic
